name: Flappy Birdy - The 2.0
description:
Left click will make the bird uplift. Try to take the white points which will provide you brightness boost temporarily. Right click makes you pass through blocks 5 times in a row.

A website I made on this game for digging more if you want: https://arpitsrivstva.github.io/Final-Year-Project-Flappy-Bird/

More updates coming soon.
